Hello, I am a bioinformatics researcher with a focus on understanding the microbial world through computational approaches. My current research is centered on the human microbiome and how the microbial genes are associated with different human factors. I am also engaged in developing bioinformatics tools and pipelines for analyzing viral genomes.
